Chinedu Sunday Chukwu (amuru n'ubochi 28 n'ọnwa February n'afọ 1997 na Nkanu East, Enugwu Steeti) bu onye okachamara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria nke na-agba egwu dika Etiti Azụ nke Kano Pillars FC na  Otu Ọkachamara Egwuregwu Bọọlu nke Naijiria
Ọ na-agba mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka onye na-agbachitere etiti
Sunday Chukwu malitere ọrụ ntorobịa ya na Abia Comets, ebe ọ gbara bọọlu site n'afọ 2013 ruo n'afọ 2015.

Mgbe afọ abụọ nke omere ofụma na Abia Comets gara, N'oge 2017-2018 nke Otu Ọkachamara Egwuregwu Bọọlu Football ,ọ  gáfèrè  Kwara United nke Ilorin, ya na ha debanyere nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ ebe ọ gbara mgbe nile na oge mpụta mbụ ya ma  pụtakwa na egwuregwu 23 na nye goolu 5

N'ubochi 1 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2019 mgbe ọ jụsịrị ọtụtụ onyinye sitere na klọb ndi Otu Ọkachamara Egwuregwu Bọọlu nke Naijiria, ọ bịanyere aka na ndị mmeri egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria ugboro anọ Kano Pillars FC na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ
